CustomField.description: The Total Expenses for this Event. Automatically calculated from related Expense fields, but can also be manually entered. Will be overridden by any updates to any Expense fields.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Total Expenses for this Event. Automatically calculated from related Expense fields, but can also be manually entered. Will be overridden by any updates to any Expense fields.
CustomField.label: Total Expenses
